title: LeBron: Cavs will adjust to match Warriors, won't tweak starters
author: Dave McMenamin, ESPN.com
content: OAKLAND, Calif. -- Just because the Golden State Warriors' decision to go small with their starting lineup in Game 4 of the NBA Finals -- replacing Andrew Bogut with Andre Iguodala -- paid off with a win Thursday doesn't mean the Cleveland Cavaliers will adjust their first unit for Game 5 on Sunday, according to LeBron James.
